Name: AppCookieStickinessPolicy
Documentation: The AppCookieStickinessPolicy type is an embedded property of the AWS::ElasticLoadBalancing::LoadBalancer type.

Parameters.Name: CookieName
Parameters.Documentation: Name of the application cookie used for stickiness.

Parameters.Name: PolicyName
Parameters.Documentation:
The name of the policy being created. The name must be unique within the set of policies for this Load Balancer.
Note
To associate this policy with a listener, include the policy name in the listener's PolicyNames property.
